title: Myrkulite Scourge
content:
Myrkulite Scourge Uncommon 3~15 Damage 1d8 +1 Bludgeoning+1d6Necrotic Weapon Enchantment +1 Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal 1 Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A browning piece of brain sticks stubbornly to one of the spikes. Flail 0.9 65
